subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
lead_paragraph: With Peyton Manning’s absence laying bare the holes in the Colts’ roster, the owner, Jim Irsay, fired the team president, Bill Polian, and his son Chris, the general manager.
snippet: With Peyton Manning’s absence laying bare the holes in the Colts’ roster, the owner, Jim Irsay, fired the team president, Bill Polian, and his son Chris, the general manager.
